医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
脉搏血氧仪的精度在皮肤色素组中各不相同根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院的研究，与较浅的皮肤色素相比，用脉搏血氧仪测量的脉搏血氧仪的估计值与脉搏血氧仪测量的脉搏血氧仪估计水平之间的差异或偏差相比，用脉搏血氧仪测量的动脉血液中的氧饱和度显着变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/pulse-oximeter-accuracy-accuracy-varies-varies-across-skin-skigment pigment-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/pulse-oximeter-accuracy-accuracy-varies-varies-across-skim-skigment pigment-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cd560c1-e2b4-4134-8d4b-0257a0e97901 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 01:55:20 -0400 Pulse oximeter accuracy varies across skin pigment groups
与安慰剂相比在美国心脏病学院年度科学会议上的一项研究显示，在不受控制的高血压患者中，研究药物劳伦德氏菌在12周时的血压显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/investigational-drug-lorundrostaters-news-smincimpicigational-pressigation-drop-drop-drop-prop-with-with-placebo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/investigational-drug-lorundrostat-finders-simpripicatigational-pressigation-drop-drop-drop-with-with-placebo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86190128-add2-4BA7-9190-86BE86BFEADD Mon, 31 Mar 2025 01:17:04 -0400 Investigational drug lorundrostat offers significant blood pressure drop compared with placebo
心力衰竭患者在TAVR手术后受益于Dapagliflozin接受经导管主动脉瓣置换（TAVR）后，接受Dapagliflozin的心力衰竭的患者（钠 - 葡萄糖辅助蛋白2（SGLT-2）抑制剂）的患者与未在美国学院的一年相比，与未接受该药物的患者相比，一年不接受心脏失败的患者的心脏失败的可能性大大降低或经历的患者的可能性大大降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/heart-failure-patients-benefit-from-dapagliflozin-from-dapagliflozin-fter-ter-tavr-procedure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/heart-failure-patients-benefit-benefit-from-dapagliflozin-fter-fter-ter-tavr-procedure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=528DA008-3BF8-4945-BB2D-1602A3CD18A2 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 01:07:47 -0400 Heart failure patients benefit from dapagliflozin after TAVR procedure
AI模型与高敏性肌钙蛋白测试匹配诊断心脏病发作根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的研究，经过训练的人工智能（AI）模型，基于心电图读数（ECG）读数的冠状动脉（ECG）读数的表现要好，并且与肌钙蛋白T测试相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai-matches-matches-high-sensitivity-sensitivity-troponin-testing-in-diangegnosing-hernt-Attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/ai-model-matches-high-sensitivity-sensitivity-troponin-testing-in-diandiandosing-hendert-Attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0def2E70-90BF-4011-91D8-CCBB0269C820 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 00:44:00 -0400 AI model matches high-sensitivity troponin testing in diagnosing heart attacks
天然补品会适得其反吗？评论解释了如何以及为什么一项新的评论发现，根据剂量，持续时间和递送，常见的自然补充剂如何保护和危害健康，并指出下一代技术是释放其全部治疗能力的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/can-natural-supplements-backfire-review-explains-how-and-why.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/can-natural-supplements-backfire-review-explains-how-and-why.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A943025-1BD6-4F28-B176-F832414BD7D6 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 00:44:00 -0400 Can natural supplements backfire? Review explains how and why
新试验表明，口服semaglutide减少了糖尿病患者的心血管事件Semaglutide的注射和口服形式都是胰高血糖素样肽-1受体激动剂，由于其针对体重增加，高血糖甚至酒精渴望的有效性而引起了人们的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-trial-shows-oral-semaglutide-reduces-cardiescular-cardiescular-vents-cardescular-vents-in-diabetes-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/new-trial-shows-oral-semaglutide-reduces-cardiesculas-cardiascular-vents-cartients-in-diabetes-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4659d641-5BA1-47BA-8D35-933A9C58AB04 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 00:31:15 -0400 New trial shows oral semaglutide reduces cardiovascular events in diabetes patients
并非所有中国食品都是平等的：研究通过炎症潜力排名美食研究人员使用饮食炎症指数（DII）分析了八种主要中国美食的980盘，以评估其营养概况和炎症潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/not-all-chinese-food-is-equal-is-qual----------- ranks-cuisines-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-potential.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/not-all-chinese-food-is-equal-es-equal-squal-cuisines-cuisines-cuisines-by-shiman-by-shimand-potential.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2304C1E3-0A2B-4562-4562-8ACC-7A1EC9C9C9C9C9C9FE57 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 00:12:00 -0400 Not all Chinese food is equal: study ranks cuisines by inflammatory potential
食品输送应用程序可以降低盐的使用，而一小部分则可以研究人员测试了中国食品送货应用程序上的菜单设计和健康消息是否可以推动客户订购低盐餐。他们发现，更改菜单上的默认设置（尤其是默认为“减少盐”）比单独的教育信息更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/food-delivery-apps-can-lower-salt-salt-use-with-with-one-small-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/food-delivery-apps-can-lower-salt-salt-salt-us-with-one-no------------ use-with-one-small-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=832027CD-509E-4EDA-AEDA-A523-F1E0D99CF446 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 23:32:00 -0400 Food delivery apps can lower salt use with one small change
AI揭示了全球包装食品中有多少隐藏糖研究人员开发了一种机器学习算法，以准确预测全球包装食品中的免费糖含量。该模型可以根据纤维和糖含量对碳水化合物质量进行大规模评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/ai-reveals-how-much-much-hidden-hidden-sugar-is-in-in-cake--in-cake--foods-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/ai-reveals-how-much-hidden-hidden-hidden-sugar-is-in-in-ac-in-cappaged-foods-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3065020-7d96-466f-a7fc-fc-fc9638003672 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 23:08:00 -0400 AI reveals how much hidden sugar is in packaged foods worldwide
咖啡因和甜菜根汁在重复的高强度运行中击败疲劳咖啡因与甜菜根汁相结合可显着改善非运动员男性的初始和重复的1000米跑步性能。体内脂肪百分比，睡眠持续时间和营养作为影响耐力结果的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/caffeine-and-beetroot-juice-juice-juice-beat-fatigue-in-repeated-in-repeated-high-inger-intmenty-runs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/caffeine-and-beetroot-juice-juice-juice-beat-fatigue-in-repeated-in-repeated-high-ingh-inger-intmenty-runs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41770467-7f24-4806-a45f-889054bd69ae Sun, 30 Mar 2025 21:29:00 -0400 Caffeine and beetroot juice beat fatigue in repeated high-intensity runs
